Plot: Beyond Borders is an epic tale of the turbulent romance between two star-crossed lovers set against the backdrop of the world's most dangerous hot spots. Academy Award winner Angelina Jolie...
Title: Beyond Borders
Actors: Angelina Jolie, Clive Owen, Teri Polo, Linus Roache
tomatoConsensus: Beyond Borders is good-intentioned, but the use of human suffering as a backdrop for a romance comes across as sanctimonious and exploitative.
